Package controller

Class mainController

java.lang.Object
controller.mainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that provides control logic for the main screen of the application.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes controller and populates table views.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • toModifyProduct

      public void toModifyProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the ModifyProductController. The method displays an error message if no product is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Product modify button action.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • toModifyPart

      public void toModifyPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Loads the addPartController. The method displays an error message if no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Product modify button action.
      Throws:
      IOException - From FXMLLoader.

    • deletePart

      public void deletePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Deletes the part selected by the user in the part table. The method displays an error message if no part is selected and a confirmation dialog before deleting the selected part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Part delete button action.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Deletes the product selected by the user in the product table. The method displays an error message if no product is selected and a confirmation dialog before deleting the selected product. Also prevents user from deleting a product with one or more associated parts.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Product delete button action.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toExit

      public void toExit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exits the program.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Exit button action.

    • getSearchResults

      public void getSearchResults​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Initiates a search based on value in parts search text field and refreshes the parts table view with search results. Parts can be searched for by ID or name.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Part search button action.

    • getProductSearchResults

      public void getProductSearchResults​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Initiates a search based on value in products search text field and refreshes the products table view with search results. Parts can be searched for by ID or name.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Part search button action.

    • checkMinVal

      public static boolean checkMinVal​(int min, int max)
      Validates that min is greater than 0 and less than max.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value for the part.
      max - The maximum value for the part.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if min is valid.

    • checkInv

      public static boolean checkInv​(int stock, int min, int max)
      Validates that inventory level is equal too or between min and max.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value for the part.
      max - The maximum value for the part.
      stock - The inventory level for the part.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating if inventory is valid.

    • alertToDisplay

      public static void alertToDisplay​(int alertNum)
      Displays various alert messages.
      Parameters:
      alertNum - Alert message selector.
